oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Assessing welfare of organic laying hens in Finland with resource-related and animal-related methods
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Holma, U.
Valros, A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this study was to assess the welfare of organic layer flocks in Finland and to compare resource-related methods with animal-related methods.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Holma, U. and Valros, A. (2006) Assessing welfare of organic laying hens in Finland with resource-related and animal-related methods. In: Proceedings of the 18th Nordic symposium of the International Society for Applied Ethology, Finnish Society for Applied Ethology, p. 17.
